rules_text:
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
Escape {1}{R}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
When Unexpected Guests escapes, destroy target artifact you don't control.
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
II – Destroy target artifact you don't control. Create a blood token.
III – Unexpected Guests deals 2 damage to each opponent.
